chapters.chapter_text: You wake up in a dark room... but wait, it doesn't feel right... it's not... nighttime
You wake up in a dark room... but wait, it doesn't feel right... it's not... nighttime
No, it's not dark... you can't see... you've gone blind!
Congratulations on the self control, but you are still blind
You've chosen to panic... May I suggest not doing that?
